Hoot's BRMSEA

Source: R/Bayesian_helpers.R
brmsea.Rd

Adapted from Hoots et al., 2017, https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/suppl/10.1177/0013164417709314

Usage

brmsea(
  file = "bayesian.gh5",
  file_sel = "Chi-square values",
  ms = TRUE,
  cil = 0.05,
  ciu = 0.95,
  allout = FALSE,
  Min1 = TRUE,
  Ngr = 4
)

Arguments

file

gh5 file from Mplus

file_sel

Character. The name of the predictive check to be used. Default is "Chi-square values".

ms

Logical. If TRUE, the model is a mean structure model. Default is TRUE.

cil

Lower bound of the posterior probability interval. Default is .05

ciu

Upper bound of the posterior probability interval. Default is .95

allout

Logical. If TRUE, returns all BRMSEA values instead of the posterior probability interval. Default is FALSE.

Min1

Logical. If TRUE, uses N-1 in the denominator. Default is TRUE.

Ngr

Number of groups in the model. Default is 4.
